name: Veloz
description:
How far can you go stepping deep on the gas running straight through the intensively traffic streets of a city?

• One button gameplay for everyone to try on
• Immersive adrenaline at high speed
• Challenge your friends in the leaderboards
• Astonishing car crashes with real sound effects
• Discover new environments and weather conditions
• Superb 3D graphics with quality settings

Be careful: this game can be highly addictive. Enjoy without borders!
